column2: "Emi nye yi: Wɔngye mo ho dase wɔ EWURADZE enyim

Oho

column4: na oyii hom egyanom fii Egypt asaase do bae."

na hom egyanom kekaa mu frɛɛ EWURADZE no

na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Ana nnyɛ ewifua twaber nye ndɛ bi a? Merefrɛ EWURADZE
column3: ma ɔaama asenaman na nsu aba; na hom aahwɛ ehu dɛ hom ndzebɔn a hom ayɛ no wɔ EWURADZE enyim dɛ hom ebisa ɔhen ama hom ho no ɔso."
na EWURADZE maa asenaman na nsu baa da no: na ɔman no nyinara suroo EWURADZE na Samuel kɛsenara."

column2: "Na ɔman no nyinara see Samuel dɛ

column2: "Na osian EWURADZE ne dzin kɛse no ntsi ɔnnkɔpow ne man: osiandɛ ɔasɔ ɔnoara EWURADZE n’enyi dɛ ɔbɛyɛ hom ɔman ama noho."

column3: Nyankopɔn mpa ngu dɛ mebɛyɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE dɛ mibegyaa dɛ mosɔr mema hom: mbom mebɛkyerɛkyerɛ hom wɔ ɔkwan a oye na ɔtsen no mu."
na hom mfa hom akoma nyinara nsom no nokwar mu: na hom ndwen ndzɛmba akɛseakɛse a ɔayɛ ama hom no ho."
